product_overview: Club Pulse System is a SaaS platform designed for comprehensive sports club management. It supports multi-tenancy, providing tools to manage users, memberships, facility bookings, payments, championships, teams, and related club operations through a modular full stack web application.
core_goals: Enable efficient management of multiple sports clubs within a single platform
Provide robust user authentication and role-based access control (RBAC) for security and privacy
Facilitate booking and scheduling of club facilities with conflict detection and payment integration
Manage memberships, subscriptions, and physical access control seamlessly
Support comprehensive championship and team management including fixtures, attendance, and travel logistics
Offer a fully integrated store and payment processing system with cart and checkout capabilities
Ensure GDPR compliance including user consent management and document verification
key_features: Authentication & Authorization with JWT, Google OAuth, RBAC, and GDPR consent management
Facility Booking system with real-time availability, Redis locking to prevent double-booking, and dynamic pricing
Membership management with tiers, scholarships, and physical access validation through QR/Pin
Championship management including tournament creation, match fixtures, standings calculation, and volunteer assignments
Team logistics covering attendance tracking, travel event management, and player status monitoring based on medical certifications and memberships
Store functionality with product catalog, client-managed cart, and MercadoPago integration for checkout and payment processing
Notification service for user alerts via email and SMS
User and family management with detailed role assignments and GDPR fields
Document management for user verification supporting uploads, approvals, and expiry tracking
user_flow_summary: Member Login and Facility Booking with payment: login, select slot, pay via integrated gateway, receive booking confirmation
Admin Championship Season Management: create championship, register teams, generate fixtures, update match results, view standings
Medical Staff Document Compliance Workflow: upload medical certificates, review and approve documents, update player status accordingly
validation_criteria: Authentication flows must enforce RBAC and secure JWT session management
Facility bookings must prevent conflicts using Redis locks and ensure membership validity before confirming
Membership tiers and scholarships must correctly influence pricing and access rights
Championships must generate fixtures and update standings accurately and in real-time
Store checkout processes must validate cart contents and integrate seamlessly with the payment gateway, updating order status accordingly
GDPR compliance requires logging user consent versions and managing document approvals with expiry notifications
Physical access control checks must verify active subscriptions before granting entry
Notification services must reliably send emails and SMS alerts to intended recipients
